name: CubeRun (itch)
description:
Hello everyone,

This is my first game, I developp it on my free time. I'm not (yet ?) a professionnal game artist but I hope that project will please you. :)

What is it ?
In Cuberun all you have to do is to collect orbs to activate a final sphere that will allow you to move on to the next level. But be careful, you walk on cubes that will change color and properties according to your position.

How to play ?

Key features
- Play with a keybord/mouse or with your Xbox360 gamepad
- 12 levels (3 tutorials and 4 with randomize prefabs)
- 4 differents types of cube
- An endurance bar
- The ability to jump and run
- Scoring system
- Save system
- A randomize atmospheric system
- 6 languages (English / Français / Deutsch / Español / Portugués / Italiano)

* You can complet all the game without running or jumping but truly, these abilities can save your life.

What next ?
I want to add randomize prefab in all levels and create 9 others levels.  Also, I will fix all the bugs.

I hope to have your opinions.

Have a nice game ! ;)

My patreon : https://www.patreon.com/haorou
